title: If no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns 200 OK with no content instead of 404
description:
When starting a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed, accessing a URL returns a HTTP code of 200 OK with no content, instead of returning an HTTP error code of 404.

Steps to Reproduce:
OB:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
- Expected Behavior: An HTTP error code of 404 should be returned
- Observed Behavior: An HTTP code of 200 OK with no content is returned
EB: An HTTP error code of 404 should be returned when accessing a URL on a Tomcat 7 instance with no webapps deployed.
SR:
1. Download the Tomcat 7 instance from http://mirror.veriportal.com/apache/tomcat/tomcat7/v7.0.0beta/bin/apachetomcat7.0.0.zip
2. Start the Tomcat 7 instance without deploying any webapps
3. Access a URL
- The returned HTTP code and content should be checked
- If the returned HTTP code is 200 OK and there is no content, the issue is reproduced
